name: Von Colln, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company

judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
parties: Von Colln, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the Per Curiam opinion of the learned court below.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: F. Hastings Griffin, Jr., with him Theodore Toorhees and Barnes, Dechert, Price, Myers S Clark, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Von Colln, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.
Argued November 16, 1950.
Before Drew, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
David Freeman, for appellants.
F. Hastings Griffin, Jr., with him Theodore Toorhees and Barnes, Dechert, Price, Myers S Clark, for appellee.
April 17, 1951:
